name: IslandOfZeus
description:
This is IslandOfZeus, made for Leap Motion's 3D Jam.

Be Zeus on his last blanc canvas, a small empty island. Make it rain to make the grass and trees grow, form the island building hills and mountains, create humans and watch them grow and rage battles, destroy with the might of your hands and Zeus' trademark lightning bolt!

Submitted on the 8th or November, one day before the deadline for the 3D Jam, having only discovered the 3D Jam two weeks ago, here is a small list of what I would have integrated into this game if I'd had the time:

More tools both destructive and creative.

More advanced human development and interactions

The possibility to create animals

To win more power when the humans prey to you, humans prey when you help then and bring them food (animals and rain for plants)

Check out my other project on Twitter: @BeauWorlds
